metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2327 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: io_uring use work_flags to determine which identity need to grab from the calling process to make sure it is consistent with the calling process when executing IORING_OP. Some operations are missing some types, which can lead to incorrect reference counts which can then lead to a double free. We recommend upgrading the kernel past commit df3f3bb5059d20ef094d6b2f0256c4bf4127a859

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> duplicate or much related to CVE-2022-2209 sbeattie> initial investigation indicates that this likely only affects 5.10 and earlier, but not as far back as 5.4. But everything about this issue is unclear.
